SELECT r.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, r.create_time createTime, r.create_by createBy, r.update_time updateTime, r.update_by updateBy, r.role_sort roleSort, r.role_key roleKey, r.data_scope dataScope, r.status status, r.del_flag delFlag FROM sys_role r
r.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
and r.role_key like CONCAT('%',#{roleKey},'%')
and r.status = #{status}
and DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{createStartTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{createEndTime}),'%Y-%m-%d'
order by r.role_sort
limit #{limit},#{offset}
